description.text1: We’re Arequipa’s first and only organic bean-to-bar chocolate shop, and we’re passionate about sharing the story of Peruvian cacao.
description.text2: Come and join us for one of our  bean-to-bar chocolate classes to learn more about cacao and have some fun!
description.text3: All ages are welcome in our workshops, including children.
